ingredients: 1 cup chopped pecans, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 cup chopped raisins, 1 (4 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained and chopped, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 (12 ounce) package vanilla wafers, crushed
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Cholesterol 10mg 3%, Sodium 111mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 46g 17%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 1mg 6%, Calcium 106mg 8%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 297mg 6%
